total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells in the input grid that contain the number 9.
Q2: Check if the cells to the right of the cells identified in Q1 contain the number 9.
Q3: If the cells to the right contain the number 9, replace the number 9 with the number 4.
Q4: Identify the cells in the input grid that contain the number 8.
Q5: Check if the cells below the cells identified in Q4 contain the number 8.
Q6: If the cells below contain the number 8, replace the number 8 with the number 2.
Q7: Identify the cells in the input grid that contain the number 2.
Q8: Check if the cells to the right of the cells identified in Q7 contain the number 4.
Q9: If the cells to the right contain the number 4, replace the number 4 with the number 9.
Q10: Check if the cells below the cells identified in Q7 contain the number 2.
Q11: If the cells below contain the number 2, replace the number 2 with the number 4.
Q12: Check if the cells below the cells identified in Q7 contain the number 4.
Q13: If the cells below contain the number 4, replace the number 4 with the number 2.
Q1: Identify the pattern in the transformation of the input grid to the output grid in the examples.
Q2: Notice that the numbers in the input grid are replaced by different numbers in the output grid. What is the rule for this replacement?
Q3: Identify the positions of the numbers in the input grid that are replaced in the output grid.
Q4: Apply the rule identified in Q2 to the numbers in the input grid of the quiz at the positions identified in Q3.
Q5: Replace the numbers in the input grid of the quiz according to the rule identified in Q4 to generate the output grid.
